mvr-group-assoc-domain.descpription: Map the MVR Group to a secific domain. There can be many profiles under a single domain

proto.decription: The L2 vlan tag that shall be added (1q,1ad)

stp-instance.decription: MSTP instance identifier of the vlan. This field does nothing if MSTP is not enabled.

disassoc-low-ack.decription: Disassociate stations based on excessive transmission failures or other indications of connection loss.

vendor-elements.decription: This option allows embedding custom vendor specific IEs inside the beacons of a BSS in AP mode.

tip-information-element.decription: The device will broadcast the TIP vendor IE inside its beacons if this option is enabled.
